featured.text: He then coated the glue on a paper sample and found that it was not only a good bookmark, but it was great for writing notes.

definition.zh_def: 書籤；用於標記書本或文件中某一頁面的工具。
definition.en_def: A strip of material used to mark one's place in a book or document.
definition.example: I used a colorful bookmark to keep my place in the novel.
